dcterms:creator: S. Rayana
L. Akoglu
dcterms:description: The YelpChi dataset collects hotel and restaurant reviews on Yelp.com online platform. The nodes are reviews with 32 handcrafted features and includes three relations: R-U-R (reviews posted by the same user), R-S-R (reviews under the same product with the same star rating), and R-T-R (reviews under the same product posted in the same month).
dcterms:title: YelpChi

dcterms:creator: J. J. McAuley
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: The Amazon dataset includes product reviews under the Musical Instrument category. The nodes in the graph are users with 25 handcrafted features and contain three relations: U-P-U (users reviewing at least one same product), U-S-U (users having at least one same star rating within one week), and U-V-U (users with top 5% mutual review text similarities).
dcterms:title: Amazon
